entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kenora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -29.0°C

Dewpoint: -32.4°C

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
